website_summaries.verdict: A lot of features for a lower price. This attractive acrylic tub comes from a respected manufacturer, and it looks great.
pros: Faucet and hand spray are included
An excellent value for the money with a limited lifetime warranty
We like the clean lines and crisp look of this tub
cons: Underside is not acrylic covered, so it has rough fiberglass edges

website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful tub with a lot of user-friendly features by a top name in home baths.
pros: Faucet and hand spray are included
Stylish design pairs well with classic and modern bathroom decor
cons: Underside is not acrylic covered, so it has rough fiberglass edges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Light to carry upstairs but does not feel 'plastic like' or cheap. Plner said it was simple to hook up. Tub needs to be at least 2 feet from the wall for the filler and shower attachment or the metal handheld attachment bangs against the wall. Looks beautiful in bathroom. Nice center point. One caution- make sure you have a water heater that will allow you to fill the tub without emptying the tank! We are putting in an on demand water heater for the house so I will be able to fill the tub without running out of hot water.
customer_reviews.author: A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tub!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is amazing. So glad I took a leap of faith and ordered from Amazon. Plumber commented on how easy it was to install and how great it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Shingler

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 stars because it was packaged and shipped very nicely and no damage to report
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because it was packaged and shipped very nicely and no damage to report. The filler (faucet) is nice looking, however the leaky spray handle should have an arm that goes over the inside of the bath instead of being outside of the bath. My floor gets wet every time i use the sprayer and it's super annoying! Now I feel like I need to tile the walls around it, so the walls don't get moisture damage.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyM

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular for the price
customer_reviews.text: The included tub filler is solid and elegant. Installation unfortunately required cutting into the ceiling below the tub filler but that may have been a function of our particular plumbing situation, and the plumber said this was common with freestanding tub fillers. Overall the tub feels solid and the finish is superb.
customer_reviews.author: InfoDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and tub for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and tub for the price. NO need to pay exorbitant amounts for it! My husband is 6'3" and he fits great in it. Loves it! Easy and light to install. Contractor said it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tub!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tub! Found on amazon for way less than in stores. It is a huge tub. Huge to me :) i am 5’3. Was delivered right to my garage. It is in two pieces that my plumber put together. It is a very light weight and beautiful tub! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Annabella Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The tub looks great!! The underground plumbing was not as easy
customer_reviews.text: The tub looks great!! The underground plumbing was not as easy, but with patience you will work it out. The "sharp edge" others have commented on is an easy fix with some mild sanding.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and great delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with the look and quality of product. Looks very high-end when installed. I hired a professional plumber to install. Took the majority of the day but turned out fantastic. The delivery was flawless. Pilot Air Freight delivered the product at the exact time it was promised. Delivery crew was very professional and handled the product with great attention. Would highly recommend the delivery company. They were actually more professional than the national moving company I had hired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good clean looking tub
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tub. Comfortable. Bit of a struggle to install. Odd british sized water supply lines make it nearly impossible to extend if needed. Outer and inner tub sections took some modification to make fit together. All and all no regrets just be prepared for a few installation difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the lip around it that had an unfinished edge so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Jill Durand

customer_reviews.title: The tub and hardware look great. It is truly a deep soaking tub and ...
customer_reviews.text: The tub and hardware look great. It is truly a deep soaking tub and holds the heat of the water. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and love it.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bathtub! Was shipped quickly and was fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the pricing, good quality item
customer_reviews.text: This tub combo is a great deal, considering a tub filler alone could cost you $1000.00. We had it installed, and the reviews are true that the supply lines are not long enough to go through the floor -- they require extensions that can be acquired from the plumbing supply store (NOT your local hardware store). That said, this tub looks great, fits two full grown adults comfortably, and (contrary to reviews on another site from some cast iron lovers) holds temperature quite well. If you want the look on a budget, this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love this tub!
customer_reviews.text: The tub is deep. We did have our plumber install it. It is very sturdy and is secured to the floor. My only complaint is the tub filler takes forever to fill up the tub.
customer_reviews.author: mark krakowski

customer_reviews.title: ... nervous to buy this online but it really is nice. Light weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy this online but it really is nice. Light weight but sturdy. Came packaged well!
customer_reviews.author: Kip's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tub. I was concerned about the tub being Shipped so far but it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub good quality Terrible description it states he drain ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub good quality Terrible description it states he drain is in the center it is not it’s the middle and off to one side which now means hammering up my drain lines and tiled floors
customer_reviews.author: Barnaby West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great and so much more reasonably priced then what was being sold locally
customer_reviews.author: TBP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable relaxing tub, easy to install in our new master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tub. Installed for a picky interior designer who thought it looked fab. We had a pro bathroom remodeler install it. Also very happy with the faucet that came with the tub. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for a high end looking bathroom that you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for a high end looking bathroom that you don't plan on using the tub often. The tub is not 1 solid piece. It is rather cheap but I just needed a nice looking tub. Don't plan on using it. Doing a 35k master bath remodel. It's more of a statement piece under a crystal chandelier than a practical purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TWeb

customer_reviews.title: Great price poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty tub but quality is not great. it's really light weight and sounds thin and tinny. Can't beat the price. I used it in a home I am selling so for the money it was good but I would be really upset to have purchased this for my own home.
customer_reviews.author: shrimpsdad

customer_reviews.title: You won't have buyer's remorse!  You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using our new tub for a few months now. Although we love our new shower, this tub is so wonderful that it has fast become everyone's favorite! It's so comfortable and we never have any issues with the water staying warm. The cost of this tub with the faucet, is also so much less than any of the others that we looked at. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: iris

customer_reviews.title: ... only feel sharp edge but also feel 'shredded ' like rough material
customer_reviews.text: Received the tub and I was hoping previous posts were wrong- but they were correct- there is a dangerous lip around the tub and you can not only feel sharp edge but also feel 'shredded ' like rough material! The manufacture should be alerted - someone could get very hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Marder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! According to my husband who did the install, it was no problem. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great tub and filler, but problematic filler install!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tub looks great in my bathroom. Would have given it 5 stars had the filler not been so difficult to mount and plumb in - instructions suggest fitting from below which would have meant drilling a hole from room down stairs!! My husband fabricated a special thin support and used PEX fittings to plumb in from our bathroom floor space. American Standard should be up front with the filler mounting and plumbing requirements in the advertisement of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Faucet included is not American Standard, which is not a huge problem. We found out when we called American Standard to ask some install questions. They explained that the faucet was not their brand and if installed it would void the warrant on the tub. We had already had the drain and water line in place and had to use it even though according to American Standard said it voided our brand new tub. The tub is beautiful and has a great look. There are some sharp edges when installing but none once installed completely. I don't understand why Amazon would package items that can possibly void each other's warranty....not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K Gray

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE-must be on a crawl space
customer_reviews.text: The tub itself is great, however the filler cannot be mounted on a slab. It has to be mounted on a crawl space. I called American Standard and confirmed once my plumber told me it wouldn't work. I paid extra for the satin nickel and now I have to pay for another filler. There is nowhere in the description that says it can't be on a slab. You'd think they would give you a warning
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kimbrow

customer_reviews.title: I also loved this minimalist style
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt bought this free standing bathtub and looks very elegant. I also loved this minimalist style:  I just loved how it looks like a precious porcelain. It looks like it can't be easily scratched or get dull. ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tub. I have now had it two years ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tub. I have now had it two years and am as pleased today with my purchase as I was when I first installed it. Yes, we installed it ourselves. You really do need to place it in a bed of mortar to get a really sound base.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Its Whiteness Belies Its Filth
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tub for my reptile collection. Unfortunately, my three year old thought it would be great to give them all a soaking before naptime. I didn't discover the flood until my downstairs neighbor came upstairs to complain. By then, all the lizards were bloated and the turtles were bobbing. Kid woke up crying and the neighbor called the supe. AND the PETA on me. What started out as good clean fun has ruined my marriage and my rent controlled apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

product_meta.title: American Standard 2764014M202.011 Cadet Freestanding Tub, Arctic
product_meta.description:
A tradition of practicality and function. This freestanding soaking bathtub with an extra deep bathing well is the newest addition to our Cadet Suite. It features sleek, contemporary styling that goes well with classic and modern décor. Comes complete with a tub filler with hand spray and drain. Freestanding installation.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Classic styling with an eye toward simplicity. Comprehensive collection features a variety of coordinating toilets, bidets, sinks, tubs and whirlpools for a total design solution that feels effortless and looks polished. This adaptable collection features sleek and contemporary styling that perfectly matches any bathroom, from classic to modern décor.
feature_bullets: Installed size with filler: 66 inches x 42 inches min x 23 inches (1676 x 1067 min x 584mm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
